summary: Over 15 years within the ICT services industry to serve global domain customers. He is a divergent thinker who is capable of leading and addressing business dynamics quickly based on a lot of startup and corporate work experience. Acted as the primary technical resource, leading projects and product support with high visibility. Level-headed and calm in stressful situation with well-developed people skills.

education.institution: National Taiwan University of Science and Technology, Taiwan

experience.description:
• To provide consulting services in Cloud and Industrial IoT projects 

• Design reliable, secure and cost effective applied solutions. 

 ※ Certified Huawei Cloud Consulting International Partner

• Technical Consulting for L2/L3 High Performance 10G/40G Advantech and ODM Network Switches 

 • Network Research: Smart NIC, Open vSwitch, DPDK, CORD, SDN, OPNFV 

 • Virtualization: Linux KVM, LXC and Docker 

 • Cloud Solutions: Advantech servers and switches with OpenStack, AWS, GCP cloud services 

 • Build the end-to-end CI/CD pipeline for automatic deployment

• Redesign company web site 

• Maintain IT infrastructure and cloud services 

• Technical Consulting for in-country/oversea customers and bidding projects

On-Ramp Wireless™ has its wireless network standard and infrastructure designed from the ground up to power wide-area machine-to-machine communication. 

 Most of the time in Japan, Korea, Hong Kong, China, Singapore and Taiwan deployment pilots 

 • Provide in-depth technical product advice and demo support during pre-sales and field trials 

 • Configure on-premises cloud to respond business dynamics in diversity regions 

 • Regular on-site product technical training to strengthen partner and agent relationship 

 Coordinate with U.S. San Diego R&D and operation teams to make success in Asia-Pacific regions

Over IP Solutions (KVM, Power, Serial, Control Center software) and video switches 

 • Provide product solutions technical support to channel sales and Asia-Pacific region agencies 

 • Technical training seminar for agencies and exhibition setup and demo support 

 • Collaborate with R&D and PM to reproduce bugs and fix them in product support life cycle 

 • Company Technical Support Center (eSupport) - Power User and limited Admin

Join MediaFLO(mobile TV) global project field trial in Taiwan from beginning to the end. 

 • Drive Test 

 • System Monitoring 

 • Friendly User Trial 

 • MediaFLO Exhibition Demo 

 • Trial License Extension work 

 To collaborate closely with CNS, TTV, CHT, Far Eastone, APBW, and VIBO partners to have local government and market impressed. 

 ※ QUALSTAR honor for outstanding efforts in work

• Software Engineer (2005-2006) 

 Mainly focus on IP base PDU (Power Distribution Unit with Remote Control) Project. 

 Based on KVM Self-Products and core techniques, we adopt KIRA 100 MCU developed by Raritan Germany region to PDU. The PDU is composed of control board and relay board. 

 The overall developing platform is Linux base so that hardware resources are controlled by Linux System. 

 In the period of development, I am responsible to program API between lower layer IPMI and UI. Besides, serial port communication is another task based on SNMP Protocol SPEC. The purpose is for compatible with our other peripheral products. 

 To learn how to collaborate with Germany engineering team and see their persistent attitude in doing system design and implementation. 

 • Technical Support Engineer (2004-2005) 

 Taiwan IT department is the Hub of Asia Pacific. I was the contact window and focus on solving any IT issues in Taiwan and do essential support for Asia regions. To plan and build-up Taiwan branch wireless infrastructure. 

 To collaborate with the network engineer in maintaining server room. 

 Server room hands-on and practical skills were learned from the first job.

role: Networking, Cloud and IoT Solutions Professional
